messages.subject: Re: 2255 - not structured?
messages.msgSnippet: on 8/16/02 9:17 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... Deal with the neatness. He s way over his head with structure. Don t believe for a minute that
messages.messageBody:
on 8/16/02 9:17 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

>> My husband thinks I am not "structured" and they are
>> learning by my example not to be neat

Deal with the neatness. He's way over his head with "structure."
Don't believe for a minute that you are "structurally flawed."
It is the work of diabolical mind twisters to make people think that
something is wrong with their brains.

Schools do that to kids all the time, and put them into the prison called
Special Education. Schools do it for the extra money. Is it really so
surprising that some kids go into those places with guns blazing?

Ned Vare
